block.field: Add Mesh, Light or Camera to the Scene.
Set property of a previously created Camera. Position and lookAt require a Geometry Vec3 type.
Get property of a previously created Camera.
Set property of a previously created Light.
Get property of a previously created Light.
Set property of a previously created Geometry.
Get property of a previously created Geometry.
Return a new Vector of 2 dimensions.
Return a new Vector of 3 dimensions.
Return a new Vector of 4 dimensions.
Set property of a previously created Material.
Get property of a previously created Material.
Create a new Mesh from a glTF, OBJ or Collada file.
Create a new Group from Meshes or Groups.
Set property of a previously created Mesh.
Update property of a previously created Mesh.
Get property of a previously created Mesh.
Render a Scene with a previously created Camera.
Append an Event Listener to the document.
